statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); user=$(whoami); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); git_info=''; [ -n "$branch" ] && git_info=" (git:$branch)"; remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); ctx_info=''; [ -n "$remaining" ] && ctx_info=" [ctx:${remaining}%]"; printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m%s%s" "$user" "$dir" "$git_info" "$ctx_info"
